entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 20 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
